data.name: Volleggball
data.description:
Get ready to crack some eggs in Volleggball, the ultimate VR volleyball game starring everyone's favorite spherical breakfast food!

Serve up some fun in this egg-citing game where you'll bump, set, and spike your way to victory against your eggy opponents. Join forces with a teammate egg and take on two rivals in an epic battle of shells and spikes!

Explore the egg-straordinary island court, but watch out for those Bomb balls - one misstep and you'll be scrambled!

And the best part? It's now free to play! Join your fellow eggs in the multiplayer training grounds and hatch your skills to perfection.

But wait, there's more! Customize your egg with a variety of shell-acious hats, gloves, shoes, and more! 

So, what are you waiting for? Come join the fun with the only volleyball game where the players are eggs (and explosions)! Hop on over to our Discord and give us your egg-spert feedback!

https://discord.gg/NvRjfSnmma
